mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wmti_profile ( member_id, username, age, income, fixed_cost, surplus_amount, period, purpose, created_at ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{username}, #{age}, #{income}, #{fixedCost}, #{surplusAmount}, #{period}, #{purpose}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS memberId, username, age, income, fixed_cost AS fixedCost, surplus_amount AS surplusAmount, period, purpose, created_at AS createdAt FROM wmti_profile WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.update: UPDATE wmti_profile SET username = #{username}, age = #{age}, income = #{income}, fixed_cost = #{fixedCost}, surplus_amount = #{surplusAmount}, period = #{period}, purpose = #{purpose}, created_at = #{createdAt} WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
